attributes.action: pass legislation to ensure that the Royal Mail has to deliver its post within certain time limits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail should have to give a higher quality service before it can raise its prices. The mail should have to be delivered by a certain time (11 am) in the day to allow business and individuals to respond to mail within the same day. It should have to deliver the mail within a set date from the initial post of the letter/package. For example, first class mail should be within 2 days.
